name: Railroad Rampage
description:
Railroad Rampage is a short action roguelite game made for the Juice Jam 2! You control different wagons of your train to fight off demons trying to stop you from reaching your goal.  

After each wave you get to choose a new wagon that will be connected to your train. But every new wagon slows your train down by 10%. You can also pick nothing and get 500 points in return. Each wave features new enemies, with the final wave being a boss fight. There are a total of 7 different wagons to choose from. Of course, you can stack the wagons as well.

Story.

The world has been attacked by demons from another planet when scientists accidentally opened a portal there. Now the world is almost gone, but you have a blueprint of the portal in your possession. Your goal is to get to the lab and close the portal.

For that you have been given a train, that is repurposed for fighting with demons. Get upgraded along the way and become strong enough to save the world.

LMB - Select a wagon / Fire

RMB - Deselect currently selected wagon

Q,E - Cycle through wagons
